column1: #Text=One day , about two weeks later , von Horn and the professor were occupied closely with their work in the court of mystery .
#Text=A recent startling discovery bade fare to simplify and expedite the work far beyond the fondest dreams of the scientist .

#Text=Von Horn 's interest in the marvellous results that had been obtained was little short of the professor's -- but he foresaw a very different outcome of it all , and by day never moved without a gun at either hip , and by night both of them were beside him .
#Text=Sing Lee , the noonday meal having been disposed of , set forth with rod , string and bait to snare gulls upon the beach .

#Text=He moved quietly through the jungle , his sharp eyes and ears always alert for anything that might savor of the unusual , and so it was that he saw the two men upon the beach , while they did not see him at all .

#Text=They were Bududreen and the same tall Malay whom Sing had seen twice before -- once in splendid raiment and commanding the pirate prahu , and again as a simple boatman come to the Ithaca to trade , but without the goods to carry out his professed intentions .

#Text=The two squatted on the beach at the edge of the jungle a short distance above the point at which Sing had been about to emerge when he discovered them , so that it was but the work of a moment or two for the Chinaman to creep stealthily through the dense underbrush to a point directly above them and not three yards from where they conversed in low tones -- yet sufficiently loud that Sing missed not a word .
#Text=" I tell you , Bududreen , that it will be quite safe , " the tall Malay was saying .
#Text=" You yourself tell me that none knows of the whereabouts of these white men , and if they do not return your word will be accepted as to their fate .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=It is not fear of the white men , oh , Rajah Muda Saffir , that deters me ,  said Bududreen , " but how shall I know that after I have come to your country with the girl I shall not myself be set upon and silenced with a golden kris -- there be many that will be jealous of the great service I have done for the mighty rajah .
